Class FileBasedRepository<T,ID>

java.lang.Object
main.repository.FileBasedRepository<T,ID>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of entity managed by this repository
ID - The type of unique identifier for the entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<T,ID>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplicationRepository, EnquiryRepository, OfficerRegistrationRepository, ProjectRepository, UserRepository
public abstract class FileBasedRepository<T,ID> extends Object implements Repository<T,ID>
An abstract generic repository class for file-based persistence using Java serialization.

Provides base CRUD operations and handles persistence through object serialization. Subclasses must implement entity-specific ID handling via getEntityId(Object).

Since:
2025-04-16

  • Field Details

    • entities

      protected List<T> entities
      In-memory list of entities managed by this repository. Initialized from persistent storage on construction.

    • filePath

      protected final String filePath
      Absolute filesystem path for storing serialized entities.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileBasedRepository

      public FileBasedRepository(String filePath)
      Constructs a new repository with specified persistence location.

      Initializes entities from file if available, otherwise starts empty. Ensures parent directories exist for the data file.

      Parameters:
      filePath - absolute path to the data file (e.g., "data/projects.dat")

  • Method Details

    • loadFromFile

      protected List<T> loadFromFile()
      Loads entities from the persistence file.

      Safe to call multiple times - reloads data from disk.

      Returns:
      list of deserialized entities, or empty list if file doesn't exist or deserialization fails
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if serialized class versions mismatch (logged but not thrown)

    • saveToFile

      protected boolean saveToFile()
      Persists current entity state to disk.

      Overwrites existing file contents completely.

      Returns:
      true if save succeeded, false if any I/O error occurred
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if write permissions are insufficient

    • findAll

      public List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves a defensive copy of all entities.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface Repository<T,ID>
      Returns:
      new ArrayList containing all current entities

    • getEntityId

      protected abstract ID getEntityId(T entity)
      Template method for entity ID extraction.

      Must be implemented by concrete repositories to provide entity-specific identifier retrieval logic.

      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to extract ID from
      Returns:
      unique identifier for the entity
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if entity is null
